resources.string: Restart the application and try again.\nIf the error persists reinstall the application.
You\'re connected to the Freenet network

Freenet makes intensive use of network data. With this option enabled Freenet will run only when connected to Wifi.\n\nThese settings don\'t apply to Friend-to-Friend connections. Needs to restart the node to apply.
Freenet may cause the battery to discharge quickly. With this option enabled Freenet will run only when charging.
Access Freenet running on your phone from a PC or Tablet. The device must be on the same network. Access it through: http://%1$s:%2$d.\n\nNeeds to restart the node to apply.

Version

Freenet Mobile v%1$s. See Changelog.
Freenet %2$s Build #%3$s.

Open source application built around Freenet Project.

Developer info

Freenet mobile: Desyncr, Freenet: See contributors.

Donate

Help us keep Internet freedom alive and expand human liberty. Learn more about our fundraiser.

All support is very much appreciated.

I have read and understand the potential risks involving running a Freenet node.
